title: Gorkhi Terelj National Park
body: GORKHI-TERELJ National Park is considered one of the most beautiful worth visiting places for travelers who wanted to rest in surroundings near UB

title: Gobi Desert
body: The Gobi Desert is a vast, arid region in northern China and southern Mongolia.

title: Khuvsgul Lake
body: The largest freshwater lake in Mongolia by volume and second largest by area after Uvs Lake.

title: Хар нуур
body: Ulaagchnii Khar Nuur lake is considered as one of the oldest lakes in the world, surrounded by golden sand dunes and snow caped Mt. Otgon Tenger.

title: Khoridol Saridag
body: The Khoridol Saridag mountains are a 150 km-long mountain range in Khövsgöl aimag, Mongolia, between Khövsgöl nuur and the Darkhad valley.

title: Altai Tavan Bogd
body: The Tavan Bogd is a mountain massif in Mongolia, near the triple border with China and Russia.

title: Ulaan Tsutgalan
body: Waterfall Ulaan Tsutgalan is located at the historically important Orkhon valley with volcanic rocks in central Mongolia.

title: Sangiin Dalai Lake
body: Sangiin Dalai Lake is a salt water lake in northern Mongolia.

title: Ikh Gazriin Chuluu
body: Ikh Gazriin Chuluu is the largest part of the granite area of Mongolia.
